title: Family Guy - Volume 2 High Quality
description:
Family Guy - Volume 2 High Quality

I encoded these for my own use and have decided to share them

I wasnt that happy with the encodes from the net so picked up the US
Boxed Set's Volume 1-8

As with most NTSC Animation Sets the Telecine process is a bit harsh
I have done my best to get this as good as poss after trying various settings
If anyone has better settings feel free to tell me

I was just going to keep them in mkv's in the orig format but no player did a good job
of Detelecineing them so they looked bad

I did go for 23.976 FPS at first but quite often shots will switch to 30fps
which look really choppy cut down to 23.976 so settled on variable framerate

Example S05E01 Last 60 secs watch it on your old downloaded set..

Includes all DVD Extras 

Settings
Handbrake = svn7160
Cropping = Off
Decomb = Default
Detelecine = Default
Framerate = Same as Source (Variable)
Rate = 2 Pass 2500 kbps
x264 Preset = Very Slow
x264 Tune = Animation
H.264 Profile = High
H.264 Level = 4.1
Audio 1 = Auto Passthru
Audio 2 = Auto Passthru (Commentary)
Chapters = Included
Subtitles = None
